message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for both of us. I'm confident it will be worth more than that to you in the long run. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm looking to get the best deal possible. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,000 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which is still a good price considering the value of the product. Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $11,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $10,500?
